messages.subject: Kinghts and Samurai..
messages.msgSnippet: Not just swords.. bows, spears, pole arms.. there lots of other differences, as were the techniques.. and the difference in technique is why the weapons were
messages.messageBody:
Not just swords.. bows, spears, pole arms.. there lots of other differences, as were the techniques.. and the difference in technique is why the weapons were made the way they were..


Wilson
